sentences.en: Classic hangman word guessing game. Play and try to get the full manga pictures.
sentences.cn: 呢款游戏是猜字游戏. 如果你猜对了,你就可以见到一副完整的靓女图啦!

sentences.en: He's facing the hangman's noose , ie waiting to be hanged.
How of my clay is made hangman's lime.
sentences.cn: 我的泥土怎样被做成刽子手的石灰.

sentences.en: I often play Hangman in class.
sentences.cn: 上课时你们常常玩什么游戏?

sentences.en: It was real; he was leaving there; he was free; he had cheated the hangman.
sentences.cn: 这是真的; 他要离开那里了; 他现在自由了; 他已经死里逃生.

sentences.en: Play hangman with your spelling words with a friend.
sentences.cn: 与你的朋友一起玩词汇拼写游戏.

sentences.en: Roderigo . By heaven, I rather would have been his hangman.
sentences.cn: 罗德利哥 天哪, 我宁愿做他的刽子手.

sentences.en: The hangman who feels joy and the martyr who sobs.
sentences.cn: 快乐的绞刑吏与哭泣的殉教者.

sentences.en: The locality was spoken of as though it had been the dwelling of a hangman.
sentences.cn: 大家提起他那住处,就好象谈到刽子手的家.

sentences.en: The prisoner, his hands tied behind his back, was brought to the scene by the hangman.
sentences.cn: 刽子手把犯人带到了刑场, 他的双手绑在背后.

sentences.en: This is a game of hangman!
sentences.cn: 这是绞刑吏的一场游戏!

sentences.en: This is a modern style game of hangman.
sentences.cn: 一款现代风格的刽子手游戏.

words.tran_cn: 刽子手；绞刑吏；执行绞刑者

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to kill criminals by hanging them
